video.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
video.synopsis: Journey to the enchanted land of Equestria, where unicorn Twilight Sparkle and her pals have adventures and learn valuable lessons about friendship.

episodes.synopsis: After attempting to warn Princess Celestia about the return of wicked Nightmare Moon, Twilight Sparkle and Spike travel to Ponyville.
episodes.title: Friendship Is Magic: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Nightmare Moon challenges the ponies with obstacles they must overcome to find the Elements of Harmony before it's too late.
episodes.title: Friendship Is Magic: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Twilight Sparkle receives two tickets from Princess Celestia to the Grand Galloping Gala, all her friends want to go. Whom will she choose?
episodes.title: The Ticket Master

episodes.synopsis: It's Applebuck season in Ponyville, and a short-handed Applejack is determined to complete the harvest all by herself.
episodes.title: Applebuck Season

episodes.synopsis: Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash pal around, but when Dash's old friend Gilda the Griffon shows up, Pinkie Pie suddenly becomes a third wheel.
episodes.title: Griffon the Brush-off

episodes.synopsis: Trixie, a boastful pony with magical skills, arrives in Ponyville and irritates the other ponies, who try to get Twilight to challenge her.
episodes.title: Boast Busters

episodes.synopsis: Fluttershy must convince a sleeping dragon to move out of town before the plume of black smoke it's producing covers all of Equestria.
episodes.title: Dragonshy

episodes.synopsis: When the ponies gather at Twilight's for a slumber party, Rarity and Applejack begin a quarrel that threatens to ruin the party.
episodes.title: Look Before You Sleep

episodes.synopsis: When the ponies are afflicted with bizarre and humorous illnesses, they accuse a mysterious zebra named Zecora of placing a curse on them.
episodes.title: Bridle Gossip

episodes.synopsis: The ponies must rescue Ponyville when little multiplying creatures called Parasprites descend upon the town and begin to devour everything.
episodes.title: Swarm of the Century

episodes.synopsis: Twilight Sparkle does her very best to prepare for the upcoming annual winter clean-up without relying on her magic to help.
episodes.title: Winter Wrap Up

episodes.synopsis: Discouraged because she has not yet received her cutie mark, Apple Bloom searches out her purpose in life so that she can get her special symbol.
episodes.title: Call of the Cutie

episodes.synopsis: When Rainbow Dash and Applejack compete against each other in the annual Running of the Leaves, each pony will do whatever it takes to win.
episodes.title: Fall Weather Friends

episodes.synopsis: Rarity makes dresses for her friends for the gala, but she gets in over her head when she tries to incorporate all of their individual styling ideas.
episodes.title: Suited for Success

episodes.synopsis: Amazed with Pinkie Pie's ability to predict the future, Twilight Sparkle follows her around to find the source of her incredible abilities.
episodes.title: Feeling Pinkie Keen

episodes.synopsis: When Rarity gets magical wings so that she can watch a race, she is so taken with her new ability that she disrupts the competition.
episodes.title: Sonic Rainboom

episodes.synopsis: Fluttershy offers to baby-sit the Cutie Mark Crusaders, but she quickly discovers that they are more than she can handle.
episodes.title: Stare Master

episodes.synopsis: The Cutie Mark Crusaders sign up for a talent show, hoping to discover their special talent in life and finally earn their cutie marks.
episodes.title: The Show Stoppers

episodes.synopsis: While hunting in the woods for gems for a new dress, Rarity is taken by a group of greedy Diamond Dogs and forced to find jewels for them.
episodes.title: A Dog and Pony Show

episodes.synopsis: Rarity recruits Fluttershy as a model to impress a famous designer with her dresses, but it's Fluttershy's modeling career that takes off instead.
episodes.title: Green Isn't Your Color

episodes.synopsis: The ponies work to settle a complicated land dispute between the Apple-loosans and a herd of buffalo fighting over the same territory.
episodes.title: Over a Barrel

episodes.synopsis: Without asking permission, Fluttershy borrows the Princess' sick bird in order to heal it. Now, the ponies must get it back before she notices.
episodes.title: A Bird in the Hoof

episodes.synopsis: The Cutie Mark Crusaders seek out Twilight and the rest of the ponies to learn the stories of how they got their cutie marks.
episodes.title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

episodes.synopsis: When Twilight becomes friends with an owl who helps her with chores around the house, Spike gets jealous and fears he will be replaced.
episodes.title: Owl's Well That Ends Well

episodes.synopsis: Confused and discouraged, Pinkie Pie goes on a mission to find out why her friends are avoiding her most recent party invitation.
episodes.title: Party of One

episodes.synopsis: Expectations are high for the Grand Galloping Gala, but when the ponies arrive they find that the event isn't all they had hoped for.
episodes.title: The Best Night Ever

episodes.synopsis: When Discord, the spirit of chaos, escapes from his imprisonment in stone, Twilight and her friends must defeat him using the Elements of Harmony.
episodes.title: The Return of Harmony: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Discord causes a rift between the six friends and renders the Elements of Harmony useless, Twilight must rekindle their friendship.
episodes.title: The Return of Harmony: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hyperorganized Twilight panics when she can't find a lesson about friendship for her weekly letter to Princess Celestia.
episodes.title: Lesson Zero

episodes.synopsis: Nightmare Night's macabre celebrations are in full swing when Luna herself shows up in Ponyville, determined to change her frightening public image.
episodes.title: Luna Eclipsed

episodes.synopsis: Sweetie Belle disowns Rarity as her sister when she refuses to participate in a rough-and-tumble celebration of sisterly unity.
episodes.title: Sisterhooves Social

episodes.synopsis: Apple Bloom finally gets her cutie mark! But joy turns to panic as she gets a second, then a third, then a dozen cutie marks.
episodes.title: The Cutie Pox

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow Dash holds a flying race to determine who will win the honor of being her pet.
episodes.title: May the Best Pet Win!

episodes.synopsis: A new masked avenger steals Rainbow Dash's thunder as Ponyville's resident hero.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well

episodes.synopsis: During a trip to Canterlot, Rarity has to choose between the important social connections she's made in the capital and her uncouth Ponyville friends.
episodes.title: Sweet and Elite

episodes.synopsis: Spike's birthday gifts activate his greedy dragon instincts, causing an outrageous growth spurt that threatens to destroy all of Ponyville.
episodes.title: Secret of My Excess

episodes.synopsis: The six friends put on a play that illustrates how unicorns, pegasi and Earth ponies put aside their differences and founded Equestria.
episodes.title: Hearth's Warming Eve

episodes.synopsis: Apple Bloom does everything she can think of to stop Granny Smith from speaking to her class and causing her everlasting embarrassment.
episodes.title: Family Appreciation Day

episodes.synopsis: Pinkie Pie takes on the task of babysitting the Cakes' twin toddlers, but she finds that she's woefully unprepared for the challenge.
episodes.title: Baby Cakes

episodes.synopsis: The friends travel all over Equestria to track down Applejack, who has mysteriously disappeared after attending a rodeo competition in Canterlot.
episodes.title: The Last Roundup

episodes.synopsis: The future of Sweet Apple Acres is in peril when the Apples challenge the Flim Flam brothers to a cider-making contest. The winner takes the farm!
episodes.title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000

episodes.synopsis: After mocking it as an egghead pursuit, Rainbow Dash discovers the joys of reading while laid up in Ponyville Hospital.
episodes.title: Read It and Weep

episodes.synopsis: The Cutie Mark Crusaders create a love potion to make Cheerilee and Big Macintosh fall in love, but they quickly regret their actions.
episodes.title: Hearts and Hooves Day

episodes.synopsis: Pinkie Pie is confused about what to do when she meets Cranky Doodle Donkey, the first creature to ever refuse her offer of friendship.
episodes.title: A Friend in Deed

episodes.synopsis: After being pushed around one too many times, Fluttershy gets some assertiveness training, but then she becomes a bully herself.
episodes.title: Putting Your Hoof Down

episodes.synopsis: Twilight drives herself to distraction trying to prevent some future disaster after she receives a vague warning from her future self.
episodes.title: It's About Time

episodes.synopsis: Spike goes on a journey of self-discovery by joining the Great Dragon Migration. But can a rough-and-tumble gang of teenage dragons really help him?
episodes.title: Dragon Quest

episodes.synopsis: Fluttershy struggles to overcome her fear of public humiliation so she can help Rainbow Dash and the other pegasi get water to the city of Cloudsdale.
episodes.title: Hurricane Fluttershy

episodes.synopsis: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are excited to write the school paper's gossip column. But is it worth the pain they cause with their hurtful stories?
episodes.title: Ponyville Confidential

episodes.synopsis: Pinkie Pie starts the silliest criminal investigation in the history of Equestria when a cake she is guarding gets destroyed on the way to Canterlot.
episodes.title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express

episodes.synopsis: Twilight is confused by her conflicting feelings when she finds out that her brother, Shining Armor, is going to marry Celestia's niece, Mi Amore.
episodes.title: A Canterlot Wedding: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Twilight saves all of ponykind by freeing the real Mi Amore and defeating Queen Chrysalis, a changeling who had assumed Mi Amore's appearance.
episodes.title: A Canterlot Wedding: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Princess Celestia sends Twilight Sparkle to the wintry north to protect the magical Crystal Empire from being taken over by the wicked King Sombra.
episodes.title: The Crystal Empire, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As King Sombra gains power, Twilight Sparkle searches for a powerful artifact that will destroy the tyrant and protect the Crystal Empire forever.
episodes.title: The Crystal Empire, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In order to have more fun, Pinkie Pie clones herself over and over again, until even her friends can't tell which one is the real Pinkie Pie.
episodes.title: Too Many Pinkie Pies

episodes.synopsis: The unicorns are eager to welcome Apple Bloom's cousin, Babs Seed, when she comes for a visit, until Babs turns out to be a bully.
episodes.title: One Bad Apple

episodes.synopsis: When they discover that a magic amulet has gained a strange power over Trixie, Twilight's friends set out to save her from its sinister spell.
episodes.title: Magic Duel

episodes.synopsis: When scary campfire stories give Scootaloo nightmares, she must face her greatest fear of all: admitting to her friends that she's afraid.
episodes.title: Sleepless in Ponyville

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow Dash is thrilled to attend an elite academy until she discovers that the school encourages its students to behave recklessly.
episodes.title: Wonderbolts Academy

episodes.synopsis: Spike arranges to watch over the pets of Twilight Sparkle and her friends while they're away, but the critters are more than he can handle.
episodes.title: Just for Sidekicks

episodes.synopsis: When Granny Smith lets her plan the next Apple family reunion, enthusiastic Applejack gets carried away and loses sight of the event's true purpose.
episodes.title: Apple Family Reunion

episodes.synopsis: After Applejack saves him from a vicious wolf attack, Spike tries to repay the debt, but his endless efforts to be helpful only cause more problems.
episodes.title: Spike at Your Service

episodes.synopsis: At Princess Celestia's request, Fluttershy befriends Discord so she can help him change his ways. But can the troublemaker ever really be trusted?
episodes.title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

episodes.synopsis: At Princess Cadance's request, Twilight and her friends try to convince a special envoy that the Crystal Empire should host the next Equestria Games.
episodes.title: Games Ponies Play

episodes.synopsis: As she tries to reverse the magic of a spell that mixed up her friends' Cutie Marks, Twilight Sparkle unexpectedly discovers her own destiny.
episodes.title: Magical Mystery Cure

episodes.synopsis: Twilight Sparkle has an important new role in the Summer Sun Celebration. But the plans are postponed when Princess Luna and Princess Celestia vanish.
episodes.title: Princess Twilight Sparkle: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To stop the Everfree Forest from taking over all of Equestria, Princess Twilight and her friends must bring their elements to the Tree of Harmony.
episodes.title: Princess Twilight Sparkle: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: At Luna and Celestia's old castle, the ponies let their imaginations run wild and become convinced that the place is haunted.
episodes.title: Castle-Mania

episodes.synopsis: When the latest volume in the "Daring Do" series is delayed, Rainbow Dash and her friends offer to help the author so she can finish the book.
episodes.title: Daring Don't

episodes.synopsis: The Cutie Mark Crusaders compete for the honor of carrying the Ponyville flag at the Equestria Games.
episodes.title: Flight to the Finish

episodes.synopsis: After Spike and the Mane 6 become superheroes in a comic-book world, the only way to get back home is to defeat a supervillain known as the Mane-iac.
episodes.title: Power Ponies

episodes.synopsis: When vampire fruit bats take over Sweet Apple Acres, Applejack's efforts to get rid of them take an unexpected and frightening turn.
episodes.title: Bats!

episodes.synopsis: When Rarity goes to Fashion Week, she generously gives some fabric to another designer -- who uses it to copy Rarity's entire line.
episodes.title: Rarity Takes Manehattan

episodes.synopsis: When Pinkie Pie learns she may be related to the Apple clan, she joins them on a trip to visit a relative who can offer proof that she's their cousin.
episodes.title: Pinkie Apple Pie

episodes.synopsis: At the Equestria Games trials, Rainbow Dash is offered an opportunity to join a relay team with a better chance of winning than the Ponyville crew.
episodes.title: Rainbow Falls

episodes.synopsis: Pinkie Pie's status as super-duper party pony is at risk when the mysterious Cheese Sandwich comes to town and offers to plan a bash for Rainbow Dash.
episodes.title: Pinkie Pride

episodes.synopsis: When a sick friend shows up needing Twilight's attention, her plans for quality bonding time with her sister-in-law have to be put on hold.
episodes.title: Three's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Rarity has a crush on a travel writer but soon finds herself competing with Applejack for his attention.
episodes.title: Simple Ways

episodes.synopsis: When a member of the singing group the Ponytones has to miss an important concert, Fluttershy takes drastic measures to make sure the show goes on.
episodes.title: Filli Vanilli

episodes.synopsis: After Twilight offers to help the Cutie Mark Crusaders with their studies, the three fillies try to use the relationship to increase their popularity.
episodes.title: Twilight Time

episodes.synopsis: When some tiny, magical creatures called Breezies get into trouble as they're migrating home, Fluttershy swoops in to save them.
episodes.title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies

episodes.synopsis: After leaving Apple Bloom home alone for the day, a series of unfortunate accidents causes Applejack to regret her decision.
episodes.title: Somepony to Watch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: Spike and the Mane 6 head to the Rainbow Falls Traders Exchange looking to swap something they no longer want for something they value.
episodes.title: Trade Ya

episodes.synopsis: When her sister Maud comes to Ponyville, Pinkie Pie wants her friends to bond with her sibling -- but it turns out to be harder than they expected.
episodes.title: Maud Pie

episodes.synopsis: After Rarity steals the spotlight from Sweetie Belle, she deliberately sabotages a costume for one of Rarity's most elite clients.
episodes.title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

episodes.synopsis: A miracle, cure-all tonic has the Ponyville ponies eager to spend their hard-earned money for a chance to be rid of their ailments.
episodes.title: Leap of Faith

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow Dash prepares to take a test on the history of the Wonderbolts -- an exam she must pass to become a member of the Wonderbolts Reserves.
episodes.title: Testing, Testing, 1, 2, 3

episodes.synopsis: When Rarity loses her creative mojo, Spike finds a spell that makes all of her ideas materialize. But they soon have a negative effect on Ponyville.
episodes.title: Inspiration Manifestation

episodes.synopsis: When Spike is given the honor of lighting the torch to open the Equestria Games, his nerves get the best of him.
episodes.title: Equestria Games

episodes.synopsis: When Princess Celestia picks Discord instead of Twilight to hunt down a villain, she turns her thoughts to the chest she got from the Tree of Harmony.
episodes.title: Twilight's Kingdom: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To protect their magic and Equestria's fate, Princess Celestia, Princess Luna and Princess Cadance transfer all their powers to Twilight.
episodes.title: Twilight's Kingdom: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Mane 6 go on a mission to a seemingly happy village, where head pony Starlight Glimmer has convinced everyone to give up their Cutie Marks.
episodes.title: Cutie Markless Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Mane 6 need to retrieve their stolen Cutie Marks, expose Starlight Glimmer's secret plan and help the town's citizens regain their individuality.
episodes.title: Cutie Markless Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Twilight's friends discover that she's been avoiding her new castle, they work together to decorate it so that it resembles her beloved old home.
episodes.title: Castle Sweet Castle

episodes.synopsis: Apple Bloom is so anxious about earning her Cutie Mark that she has a series of frightening nightmares, but her friends help her deal with her fears.
episodes.title: Bloom and Gloom

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow Dash is so upset that Tank, her pet tortoise, has to hibernate for the winter that she tries to control the weather and stop the coming cold.
episodes.title: Tanks for the Memories

episodes.synopsis: When infamous outlaw Troubleshoes Clyde returns to the Appleoosa rodeo, the Cutie Mark Crusaders discover that he may not be such a bad guy after all.
episodes.title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

episodes.synopsis: When Discord learns that Fluttershy is taking a new friend to the Galloping Gala instead of him, he goes to extreme lengths to prove he isn't upset.
episodes.title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie are sent to the kingdom of Griffonstone, where they have differing ideas about  what problem they've been sent to fix.
episodes.title: The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone

episodes.synopsis: It's chaos in Ponyville as the Mane 6 battle a bugbear, and Cranky Doodle Donkey and Matilda realize that a printing error might ruin their wedding.
episodes.title: Slice of Life

episodes.synopsis: Spike shoos away visitors while Twilight rests after an important meeting, but the power of making decisions for the princess goes to Spike's head.
episodes.title: Princess Spike

episodes.synopsis: When a friendship summit with the yaks goes wrong, it's up to Pinkie Pie to make an epic voyage and find a way to help appease the angry visitors.
episodes.title: Party Pooped

episodes.synopsis: When Twilight realizes what a bad friend she was before moving to Ponyville, she goes with Spike to Canterlot to make amends to her former friends.
episodes.title: Amending Fences

episodes.synopsis: Princess Luna enlists the Mane 6 to track the Tantabus, a magical force that threatens to turn the dreams of everyone in Equestria into nightmares.
episodes.title: Do Princesses Dream of Magic Sheep
